text_logic_form: The line $AD$ is the altitude of triangle $ABC$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line $AD$ is the altitude of triangle $ABC$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $DC$ is $x + 7$ units.
The measure of angle $ADC$ is $4x - 6$ degrees.
The length of the line $DB$ is $2x - 15$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $C$.
The lines $AD$ and $DB$ are perpendicular to each other.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$, forming triangle $ABC$.
